Title: Residential Settings Investigator, Bureau of Communicable Diseases
RoleDescription: Division/Program Summary Description:   The Division of Disease Controls mission is to safeguard the health of New Yorkers through identification, surveillance, treatment, control, and prevention of infectious diseases, which is achieved through varied and interrelated endeavors of its seven Bureaus.
